overview: Greg Overholtzer brings nearly 30 years of financial management and administration experience to Omni-ID. In his role as CFO, Overholtzer is responsible for managing the company’s strategic and tactical financial and accounting activities, as well as human resources. He previously served as Corporate Controller at Genitope Corp., where he oversaw all finance and accounting functions, including SEC reporting and Sarbanes-Oxley compliance. Prior to that, Overholtzer held Corporate Controller, Chief Financial Officer, or Vice President of Finance titles at an impressive list of Northern California-based technology companies, including Stratex Inc., The Polymer Technology Group, TeleSensory Corp., and Giga-tronics Inc. In these positions, Overholtzer was responsible for financial, MIS, and human resources functions, while implementing financial management, strategic planning, and forecasting processes. He holds both an M.B.A. and B.A. in Zoology, from the University of California, Berkeley. Greg Overholtzer sits on the Board of Directors for the Academic Committee of Financial Executives International. He is also a Board Member of the UC Berkeley Haas School of Business Alumni Chapter, and a Board Committee member of the California Alumni Association.
